sentences.en: A - size robotic Tyrannosaurus Rex gave the museum an eye - catching attraction on its Piazza in early 1997.
sentences.cn: 一九九七年初,科学馆广场上出现了一件瞩目的展品 ─ ─一只如实物般巨大的机械霸王龙.

sentences.en: Additionally, Spinosaurus teeth and Tyrannosaurus teeth were completely different.
sentences.cn: 另外, 棘龙的牙齿与霸王龙的牙齿有着本质的不同.

sentences.en: And on your left, you have Tyrannosaurus Rex, a carnivore from the Jurassic period.
sentences.cn: 在您的左边, 您看到的是暴龙, 一种来自侏罗纪的肉食动物.

sentences.en: Description - What Tyrannosaurus Rex looked like.
Habitat - When and where Tyrannosaurus Rex lived.
sentences.cn: 霸王龙生活在什么时候?住哪儿?

sentences.en: In some movies, Tyrannosaurus rex 3 is shown running at top speed 4 after cars and helicopters 5.
sentences.cn: 一些影片中出现了霸王龙飞速追击汽车和直升机的场面.

sentences.en: It was a relative of Tyrannosaurus Rex . Albertosaurus was smaller than T - Rex.
sentences.cn: 它是霸王龙的亲戚, 比霸王龙要小一些.

sentences.en: T - Rex was a meat eater. Another Tyrannosaurus Rex could kill and eat a T - Rex.
sentences.cn: 霸王龙是肉食动物, 它们会捕食同类.

sentences.en: The cars beside the feet of this humongous tyrannosaurus look like small beetles.
sentences.cn: 它脚底下的越野车就像只小甲壳虫.

sentences.en: The Tyrannosaurus in the movies is a terrible combination of speed and power.
sentences.cn: 影片中的霸王龙是可怕的速度与力量的化身.

sentences.en: Tyrannosaurus Rex was a large carnivore; insectivorous plants are considered carnivores.
sentences.cn: 暴龙是一种大型的食肉动物; 食虫植物被看作食肉动物.

sentences.en: Tyrannosaurus rex was a large carnivore.
sentences.cn: 霸王龙是一种大型肉食动物.

phrases.tran_cn: 雷克斯霸王龙（恐龙名称）
